thread.title_full: Have you seen Ranveer's hilarious video for Alia? It'll make you 'look faarward' to Gully Boy all the more : Bollywood, News - India Today

title: Have you seen Ranveer's hilarious video for Alia? It'll make you 'look faarward' to Gully Boy all the more : Bollywood, News - India Today
text:
Have you seen Ranveer's hilarious video for Alia? It'll make you 'look faarward' to Gully Boy all the more You cannot miss this hilarious video by Ranveer Singh. IndiaToday.in | Written by Charu Thakur 
Alia Bhatt and Ranveer Singh uniting on screen for Zoya Akhtar's Gully Boy. Bollywood's live wire is equally excited to work with Alia. And he shared his enthusiasm through this funny video that he post for his "cute as button" co-actor Alia. 
The hilarious video shows Ranveer praising Alia in a funny accent where he claims that he likes her a lot. And she is his favourite from the younger lot. Be it her character in Kapoor And Sons or Udta Punjab or Dear Zindagi. And he is "looking faarward" to more of such fantastic films. A video posted by Ranveer Singh (@ranveersingh) on Feb 8, 2017 at 10:29am PST 
Alia simply loved the video and soon to Twitter to tell Ranveer that she loves him and is looking "double faarward" to work with him in Gully Boy. Hahahah everybody totally loves @RanveerOfficial !!!! Looking double faarward GULLY BOY :) https://t.co/xc55UeYhpC â€” Alia Bhatt (@aliaa08) February 8, 2017 
The film is inspired by real life rappers and the two will soon begin shooting for Gully Boy. 
ALSO WATCH: When Baba Ramdev defeated Ranveer Singh in a push-up battle To get the latest entertainment news and gossip, follow us on Twitter @Showbiz_IT and Like us on facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
